page.title: 01 EMPLOYMENT IN CAERSWS
page.content:
THE MAIN EMPLOYMENT IN CAERSWS IS AT {LLYS MALDWYN HOSPITAL}BUT A LOT OF PEOPLE ALSO WORK IN LAURA ASHLEYS. LLYS MALDWYN HOSPITAL IS FOR THE {MENTALLY HANDICAPPED. 200}PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED AT LLYS MALDWYN TO LOOK AFTER{60}PATIENTS. 400 PEOPLE WORK AT LAURA ASHLEY WHICH MAKES WALLPAPER AND FABRICS. OTHER EMPLOYMENT CONSISTS OF 2 HOTELS,THE{UNICORN}AND THE{BUCK.}THERE IS ALSO A VILLAGE CLUB, AN INN THE{RED {LION,}A GARAGE AND 9 SHOPS, 7 OF THEM BEING{FAMILIY BUSINESSES.} THESE SHOPS CONSIST OF A GROCERS, A BUTCHER,A NEWSAGENT,A POST OFFICE, HAIR DRESSER,A BOUTIQUE,STORES,AND A CO-OP. IN ALL 27 PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED. A LOT OF PEOPLE ARE SELF EMPLOYED AS BUILDERS,PLUMBERS,PAINTERS OR FARMERS.
